official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to set the contribution and benefit base at an amount not less than $60,000.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to set the contribution and benefit base at not less than $60,000 for years beginning with 1982.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to set the contribution and benefit base at an amount not less than $60,000.
